event.title: Explorer 1 (1st US satellite) launched at Cape Canaveral
satellite Vanguard 1 launched, orbits earth for next 3 years
NASA founded
Pioneer 1 reaches height of 70,700 mi
Pioneer 4 is 1st US satellite to orbit sun
1st successful weather satellite, Tiros 1, is launched
Allan Shepard is 1st US astronaut in space- suborbital flight
John Glenn becomes 1st American to orbit earth- 3 times
Telstar 1 transmits 1st live transatlantic TV broadcast
Mariner 2 is 1st planetary spacecraft, enters solar orbit
Martin Schmidt discovers 1st known quasar
Ranger 7 transmits 1st close range pics of moon
Edward White makes 1st US space walk- 22 mins
Mariner 4 relays 1st close-range pics of Mars
Surveyor 1 is 1st US spacecraft to land on moon
Lunar Orbiter 1 takes 1st pics of earth from moon
Apollo 8 is 1st manned spacecraft to orbit moon
Apollo 11 lands on moon- 1st men on moon
Apollo 13 launched, fails to reach moon
Apollo 14 lands on moon
Mariner 9 is 1st spacecraft to orbit another planet (Mars)
Apollo 15 lands on moon, 1st astronauts to use moon rover
Pioneer 10 launched towards Jupiter, 1st manmade object to go through asteroid belt
Pioneer 11 launched, eventually discovers new rings on Jupiter & Saturn
Skylab workshop is launched
Mariner 10 is launched on 1st duel planet mission, photographs Venus &Mercury
1st meteorological satellite launched by NASA
Viking 2 lands on mars, discovers water frost
September- Voyagers 1&2 leave earth for Jupiter & Saturn
Einstein Observatory, 1st fully functional space x-ray telescope, starts 30-day mission
2 Pioneer spacecrafts reach Venus
Pioneer 11 reaches Saturn, takes 1st close-up pics
1st mission of space transport system Columbia launched
Columbia begins 1st operational mission
Sally Ride is 1st US woman in space
Bruce McCandless is 1st man to take un-tethered spacewalk
Discovery, 3rd space shuttle, launched
Challenger launched, Kathryn Sullivan is 1st US woman to space walk
4th space shuttle, Atlantis, launches 1st mission
Voyager 2 reaches Uranus, sends pics
Space Shuttle Challenger explodes
Supernova 1987A becomes visible
Voyager 2 sends pics from Neptune
Spacecraft Galileo takes off for Venus
Space Shuttle Discovery deploys Hubble Space Telescope
spacecraft Magellan reaches Venus, begins to map surface
Compton Gamma Ray Observatory carried into space by Atlantis
space shuttle Endeavor launched on 1st mission
Mae Jemison is 1st African American woman in space
Sergei Krikalev is 1st Russian cosmonaut on US space shuttle
spacecraft Magellan enters Venusian atmosphere, burns after mission is completed
spacecraft Galileo reaches Jupiter, orbits for next two years
Mars Pathfinder reaches Mars, sends pics
Mars Global Surveyor reaches Mars, shows streams, ponds, oceans, dust storms
Lunar Prospector arrives at moon to search for frozen water at poles
NASA launches test spacecraft Deep Space 1
Space Shuttle /discovery heads for space station, bringing supplies
Space probe Galileo reaches Europa
NEAR spacecraft sends pics from asteroid Eros, orbits asteriod
NEAR lands on Eros, survives- 1st landing on an an asteroid
2001 Mars odyssey probe is sent to orbit mars
Microwave Anisotropy Probe is launched 1.5 mil km, measures background radiation
Space shuttle Columbia explodes on re-entry due to crack in wing
Galileo’s mission ends after 14 yrs by crashing into Jupiter
Spirit & oppurtunity rovers reach mars
Cassini spacecraft takes pics of saturn’s rings
Huygans probe lands on moon titan- 1st landing on alien moon
deep impact space probe collides with comet tempel 1- debris recorded & studied
spacecraft Stardust returns to earth with 1st dust from comet Wild 2
phoenix mars lander launched, discovers ice & transmits pics from mars
spacecraft kepler launched to find planets outside of solar system
spacecraft Messanger is 1st to orbit Mercury
space shuttle program ends with final launch of Atlantis
